text: Dune is an epic science fiction movie directed by Denis Villeneuve. It is the first of two movies based off of the 1965 book of the same name by Frank Herbert. It stars Timothée Chalamet, Rebecca Ferguson, Oscar Isaac, Josh Brolin, Stellan Skarsgård, Dave Bautista, Stephen McKinley Henderson, Zendaya, David Dastmalchian, Chang Chen, Sharon Duncan-Brewster, Charlotte Rampling, Jason Momoa and Javier Bardem. Dune was released in movie theatres in the United States on October 22, 2021, by Warner Bros. Pictures. Many people who watched it really enjoyed it, including casual movie-goers and professional film reviewers. The movie made $401.8 million in the box office. A sequel, Dune: Part Two, was released on March 1, 2024. ==References== Category:2021 science fiction movies Category:2020s epic movies Category:Movies based on books Category:American science fiction movies Category:American epic movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:Movies directed by Denis Villeneuve Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies set on fictional planets Category:Movies about water scarcity Category:Movies composed by Hans Zimmer Category:Dune (franchise)
title: Dune (2021 movie)
